snippet: Rodney Hood scored 15 of his 27 points in the second half, and No. 16 Duke beat Georgia Tech 79-57 on Tuesday night....

headline.print_headline: Hood Scores 27, No. 16 Duke Beats Ga Tech 79-57
headline.main: Hood Scores 27, No. 16 Duke Beats Ga Tech 79-57

lead_paragraph: Rodney Hood scored 15 of his 27 points in the second half, and No. 16 Duke beat Georgia Tech 79-57 on Tuesday night.
